Recommendations.Title: Regional Planning Policy & Casework Dear Ms Dickson Location ...
Key Strengths: Discusses solar projects larger than 80MW with details on ground-mounted solar Photovoltaic (PV) panels and the likelihood of receiving planning permission
Provides information about regional planning policies for future project submissions
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document discusses a specific case study regarding a solar farm greater than 80MW with details on the approval process and provides insights into the council's planning policies and criteria. It is likely to be informative to those interested in understanding the requirements for approval of large-scale solar projects.

Recommendations.Title: Planning Applications Decisions Issued
Key Strengths: Provides examples of previous planning decisions related to solar panel installations
Contain information on the criteria applied for granting and refusing planning permission
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document provides details about planning applications previously submitted and decided, giving an overview of how similar projects have been approved or denied in the past. It can help users gain insights into the council's guidelines for granting permissions in regards to solar panel installations.

Relevant for applicants seeking information about current or planned projects related to solar panel installations
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document contains details about a specific planning application, including the project location and proposed changes. It can help users understand what is required when submitting applications for solar panel installations on existing buildings.

Recommendations.Title: Valid Applications received 06.02.23 - 10.02.23.xlsx
Key Strengths: Lists all valid applications received from 06.02.23 to 10.02.23, potentially containing details on solar projects submitted during that period

Users searching for information about active or ongoing solar energy projects can potentially find relevant details.

Recommendations.Title: Planning Applications Decisions Issued
Key Strengths: Lists decisions issued for planning applications submitted between 07 Dec 2020 and 11 Dec 2020, potentially containing information about solar panel projects
Can give insights into the council's decision processes for solar energy installations
Recommendations.Reasoning: Although not a specific resource dedicated to solar energy projects, this document provides details of planning application decisions within the given date range. Users seeking information about how local authority decides on Solar panel projects can find some clues from this source.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: Notable documents were those that provided more comprehensive explanations or clearer information related to solar panel installations, while others were more focused on planning procedures in general. Also considered the presence of details on solar installation applications in each document.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Rankings depended on relevance to council customer information needs, detailing the council's policies regarding solar energy projects and providing insights into their decision-making processes.
